title: Dense CRF implemenation
body_html: Is there an easy way to implement or use the dense CRF within tensorflow. More spesifically i would love to train my network with dens CRF. You can see more information about dense CRF from this paper.DenseCRF poster . You can see C++ implementation form here: Dense CRF C++. Is there a way to include this in tensorflow and built with it?
body_text: Is there an easy way to implement or use the dense CRF within tensorflow.  More spesifically i would love to train my network with dens CRF. You can see more information about dense CRF from this paper.DenseCRF poster . You can see C++ implementation form here: Dense CRF C++. Is there a way to include this in tensorflow and built with it?
body: Is there an easy way to implement or use the dense CRF within tensorflow.  More spesifically i would love to train my network with dens CRF. You can see more information about dense CRF from this paper.[DenseCRF poster ](http://vladlen.info/papers/densecrf-poster.pdf). You can see C++ implementation form here: [Dense CRF C++](https://github.com/lucasb-eyer/pydensecrf/tree/d824b89ee3867bca3e90b9f04c448f1b41821524/pydensecrf/densecrf/src). Is there a way to include this in tensorflow and built with it?
